sentences.en: About six tons of ammonium sulphate daily extraction, sale as a by - product .
sentences.cn: 每日提取硫酸铵约6吨,作为 副产品 出售.

sentences.en: Add Ferroin indicator and titrate with 0.025 N ferrous ammonium sulphate solution.
sentences.cn: 加入亚铁菲绕啉离子,用滴定法测量硫酸亚铁铵溶液.

sentences.en: Adding sulphate to the solution will give a precipitate.
sentences.cn: 将硫酸盐加入该溶液会产生沉淀.

sentences.en: Copper - loaded montmorillonite was prepared using montmorillonite and copper sulphate as raw materials.
sentences.cn: 以蒙脱石和硫酸铜为主要原料,制备载铜蒙脱石.

sentences.en: Each capsule contains between 30 and 100 pellets of morphine sulphate according to the strength of dose required.
sentences.cn: 根据所需剂量的浓度不同，每颗胶囊里含有30至100个吗啡硫酸盐颗粒。

sentences.en: Eat: Potassium sulphate keeps the skin pores unclogged and ventilated.
sentences.cn: 吃: 硫酸钾能保持皮肤毛孔畅通.

sentences.en: Losses of Ca and Mg are accelerated by fertilizers which supply nitrate, sulphate and chloride.
sentences.cn: 在施用硝酸盐 、 硫酸盐和氯化物的情况下会加速钙和镁的损失.

sentences.en: Methods: Detect the Polysaccharides content in Radix Saposhnikoviae with Phenol? Sulphate colorimetry.
sentences.cn: 方法: 利用苯酚? 硫酸法测定防风多糖的含量.

sentences.en: More ammonium sulphate solution is being recovered in the process of distilling oil shale.
sentences.cn: 在提炼油页岩的过程中回收的硫酸铵液比过去多了.

sentences.en: More ammonium sulphate solution is being recovered in the process of distilling shale oil.
sentences.cn: 在提炼油页岩的过程中回收的硫酸氨液比过去多了.

sentences.en: Sodium Lauryl Sulphate , Sodium Laurylsulphate, Sodium Lauryl SulfateSodium Dodecyl Sulfate, SDS.

sentences.en: The antiseptic properties of copper sulphate have never been questioned.
sentences.cn: 硫酸铜具有防腐性,这是不曾有过问题的.

sentences.en: The principal adrenocortical products are aldosterone, cortisol and dehydroepiandrosterone sulphate.
sentences.cn: 肾上腺皮质的主要产物为醛固酮 、 皮质醇和脱氢异雄酮硫酸盐.

sentences.en: The technique of manufacturing PAS by gelation from aluminium sulphate was studied.
sentences.cn: 介绍了以硫酸铝为原料,采用凝胶法制备聚合硫酸铝(PAS)的工艺技术条件.

sentences.en: We tried to grow some copper sulphate crystals with our children.
sentences.cn: 我们想跟孩子们一起制作硫酸铜晶体。
